mapper.sql: id, sciencename, sciencetype, sciencelevel, sciencestarttime, scienceendtime, teachername, responsibility, stunum, credit, facultynum, majornum, gradenum, stuname, url

select
distinct
from science
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into science (id, sciencename, sciencetype, sciencelevel, sciencestarttime, scienceendtime, teachername, responsibility, stunum, credit, facultynum, majornum, gradenum, stuname, url ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sciencename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sciencetype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sciencelevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sciencestarttime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{scienceendtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{teachername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{responsibility,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stunum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{credit,jdbcType=REAL}, #{facultynum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{majornum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{gradenum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{stuname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
